snippet.title: The Sims 4: Stories Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Create unique stories in The Sims 4. Watch weirder stories unfold in our official gameplay trailer.

Pre-order The Sims 4 now: http://bit.ly/PreorderSims

In The Sims 4, you create and control Sims with unique personalities, and the stories you make are entertaining, weird and fun. Control the mind, body, and heart of your Sims in The Sims 4!
